titleStmt.title: A seasonable warneing [sic] to the poor persecuted Church of Scotland, or Dissuasive to all true non-con[for]mists, from sinful complying with, [b]eing of, and active submitting to abjured prelats, and their underlings, by hearing of them, any other way strenghening their hands to the overturning the work of reformation Philalethes.
titleStmt.author: Philalethes, fl. 1682.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages have faded print and are tightly bound with some loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Corpus Christi College (University of Oxford). Library.
